transcript:
Customer: Bolo madam bahut pareshan hu aap kal se kiye ho batao.
Executive: Sir obviously agar aap waha par vaisa feedback denge to obviously mai baat to karungi na aap.
Customer: To mai feedback wapas le leta hu aap aap feedback wapas le liya aap bolo ab kya karna hai.
Executive: Sir wo kaise loge aap wapas aap batao wo to aapne whatsapp par ek baar de diya to de diya hai.
Customer: Thodi na wapas le paunga mai. Mai puchna chah rahi thi aapse sir aise agar aap baat karenge to fir services me to hum aapko solution bhi nahi dila payenge sir.
Executive: Wo nahi mil payega solution aap ek saal se aap ek saal se de rahi hai wo nahi mil payega mujhe ye pata hai.
Customer: Sir but aap uske liye proper aapko coordinate bhi to karna hoga na maine kai baar aapko.
Executive: Kitna coordinate karna hai aap kitna baar coordinate kare hum kis cheez ke liye coordinate kare video call ke liye aur isi tarah samjhane ke liye.
Customer: Kya obviously agar aap do saal se isi tarah humko pata nahi chal raha India mart ko abhi tak ye samajh nahi paya mai.
Executive: Sir ek cheez bataiye bina baat kiye to kisi bhi cheez ka solution nahi milta na sir.
Customer: Are kitni baar baat kiye ho mere se aap kitni baar mere se baat kiye ho batao mujhe.
Executive: To sir maine cheeze improve bhi ki hai aap conversion agar aap mujhse expect kar rahe hai.
Customer: Kuch nahi madam.
Executive: Sir agar aap conversion soch rahe hai ki mai aapko nikal ke du conversion to wo possible nahi hoga sir mai clearly aapko mention karke de rahi hu.
Customer: Mai aapko bol raha hu ki aap conversion karke do.
Executive: Mai wahi aapko bol rahi hu sir aap ye.
Customer: Aapko bol raha hu nahi ho possible nahi hai mai aapko bol raha hu conversion karke do.
Executive: To aap to yahi expect kar rahe hai na sir kyuki dekho by lead me maine already improve karwa ke bhi aapke catalog.
Customer: Aap kaise samajh rahe ho ki mai expect kar raha hu ye.
Executive: Sir fir aap ye kaise bol rahe hai ki maine improvement kara ke nahi diya aapke catalog pe maine kaam nahi kiya maine aapko by lead nahi bheji.
Customer: Mai aap kya improvement kar raha hu mai to uske baad mera to improvement apne humko apne business me dikhna chahiye na.
Executive: To yahi to dikkat hai na sir yahi to dikkat hai aap agar waha baat karenge cheeze dekhenge tab to aapko pata chalega na kya improvement hua hai.
Customer: To hum bahut kuch dekh rahe hai.
Executive: Kai baar aapne jo employee rakha hua hai aapne jo employee rakha hua hai aap ek bari un madam se bhi to puchiye na ki maine unse kai bari baat ki hai kai bari discussion kiya hai kai bari bola hai ki aap ye wala parameters aap add karo kyuki wo mere hand se nahi hoga but wo aaj tak kar payi hai aap ek baar puchiye unse aap jo humse sari cheeze puch rahe hai aapne unko bhi to kaam pe rakha hai aap unse bhi to puchiye ki wo kya kaam kar rahi hai aapke catalog pe aur kis tarike se kar rahi hai aap unse bhi to utna feedback lijiye jo aap humse lete hai.
Customer: Hum to mana hi nahi kar rahe sir.
Executive: Even already aapke catalog par.
Customer: Suno madam suno aapko mere koi complain nahi hai aap theek kar rahe ho acha kar rahe ho ab ab iske baad mai kya bol sakta hu aapko.
Executive: Sir baat complain ki nahi hai mai to aapko keh bhi nahi rahi hu aapko agar problem hogi obviously aap complain karoge kyuki aapne investment kiya hai mai us cheez ke liye mana bhi nahi kar rahi hu ki sir aap complain mat karo.
Customer: Investment mera wo investment mera zero ho gaya hai mai maan ke chal rahi hu ki mera zero investment hai iske returning nahi mil rahi hai.
Executive: Mai wahi cheez mai aapko samjhane ka try kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Wo returning nahi mil raha wo returning mujhe nahi milne wali hai mai isi tarah se soch raha hu.
Executive: Mai mai aapko wahi cheez samjha rahi hu sir ki at least ab aapko agar koi coordinate kar raha hai ki by lead bhejega aapke sath coordinate karega to uske liye to koi ek dedication person aisa ho dedicated person jo uske sath ke kaam kare tabhi to wo kaam karwa payega na sir aap ye cheez bhi samjho ab mai aapke catalog pe working nahi hu already jo sudhanshu hai wo aapke catalog pe work kar rahe hai jo meri team me hai to aap unko bhi sari problems apni share karte ho kar sakte ho aur mujhe to already pata hi hai aapko jo bhi problems hai to ye cheez maine unko khud boli thi ki aap batao kya discussion.
Customer: Itna problem itna humko abhi sab time nahi hai ki India mart se coordinate karu aur problems batau utna humko time nahi hai.
Executive: But agar aapke pass time nahi hoga to fir hum kaise solution dila payenge sir.
Customer: Humne subscription liya hai humne subscription liya hai uske according lead aani chahiye.
Executive: Sir lead aane ke liye bhi kai sare parameters hote hai jinko improve karana padta hai sir.
Customer: Aap is cheez ko samajh aapke pass agar time nahi hai.
Executive: Ye cheeze karani padti hai kya karani padti hai wo theek hai ab mai samajh gaya baat ko ab kya karna hai humko batao.
Customer: Mai aapko yahi bol rahi hu aap ek cheez samajhiye agar aapke pass time nahi hai clearly bol rahe hai aapke pass time nahi hai right aapke pass agar time nahi hai aap apni employee ko boliye jo aapke yaha par kaam kar rahi hai ki wo hamare sath coordinate kare unke pass bhi time nahi hota hai sir call uthane ka wo time hi nahi deti hai ab wo time nahi dengi aap bhi time nahi denge to fir kaise hoga aap batao wo to wo to usi kaam ke liye rakhi gayi hai na aapke aapke office me ki India mart par hi kaam karna hai unko ya fir wo aur bhi koi kaam dekhti hai.
Customer: Mai aur bhi kaam hai na khali India mart thodi diya hai maine itna bada India mart se koi business hi nahi hua ji mai special employee laga rakh di thi 20 30000 employee de du.
Executive: Log rakhte hai aur isliye subscribe nahi rakhte hai isliye maine aapko abhi tak ek rupya ka bill nahi hua na koi ek rupya ka business aaya mai employee rakh du.
Customer: Sir maine isliye nahi pucha hai ki aap aap ek person personally India mart ke liye rakho log rakhte hai sir unko business bhi aata hai maine isliye pucha ki bahut sare log.
Customer: Log rakhte honge business aata hoga hum to humko to business nahi aa raha to mai kya rakhu mai wahi aapko bol rahi hu.
Executive: India me bahut bada India me bahut logo ke pass paisa hai.
Customer: Samajh gaye wo wo aap wo aap cheeze wo humko mat batao log rakhte hai log kya karte hai.
Executive: Sir mai aapko bata nahi rahi hu aap har cheez ka nahi nahi aap har cheez ka galat galat way me leke jayenge to wo cheeze sahi nahi hogi sir maine aapse bas pucha kyuki bahut sare log rakhte hai to maine isliye bhi aapse pucha ki shayad aapne bhi personally rakha ho maine ye nahi bola ki aapne rakha hoga shayad maine bola ki shayad aapne rakha hoga.
Customer: India mart se suno na itna hum motivated nahi hai India mart se padti na humko koi excitement hai India mart se padti.
Executive: But sir aap agar aap suniye agar agar aap waha par layenge bhi na thoda bahut bhi agar waha pe cheeze ki ha mai bhi karke dekhta hu jaise samne wala bol raha hai to shayad aapko waha par uske according aapko bhi trust.
Customer: Sir is baar humne sir kai baar humne karke dekh liya na ji.
Executive: Sir kaha hua hai hua hi nahi hai jab discussion hota hai aap kitne dino se account ko dekh rahe ho.
Customer: Aapko kitni baar kara hoga mai.
Executive: Mai wahi aapko bata rahi hu sir tabhi mujhe pata hai sir mai kafi time se dekh rahi hu tabhi mujhe pata hai ki jab hamara discussion hota hai.
Customer: Aapko pata hai to aap dekho na ki kya ho raha hai.
Executive: Mai wahi to bata rahi hu sir ki jab hamara discussion hota hai tab aap hafte 10 din services ko ache se use karte ho fir aapka same rehta hai ab aap december se mai tak aapne.
Customer: Mai 10 din 10 din me dekh liya kuch respond nahi tha mai kyu usme time lagau batao aap.
Executive: Sir 10 aap ek cheez batao aap bhi kahi naya shop apna khologe apne locations ke alawa maan ke chaliye aapne ek naya branch open kar liya gurgaon ke alawa kahi other location pe aap ek cheez batao 10 din me aap waha se kya le loge sir.
Customer: To kya dekhna hai batao.
Executive: 10 din sirf 10 din me to aapko waha se kuch bhi nahi milega sir waha pe aapko proper ek time spend karna padega time dena padega waha ke local market taki aapko jane local market ke logo ke sath aapka bond bane.
Customer: Isme kaun sa time chahiye dena padega ji.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: Kya kya isme 24 ghanta hum de.
Executive: Sir 24 ghante aapka lagta bhi nahi hai 24 ghante aap apne offline shop pe dijiye India mart ko to need bhi nahi hai 24 ghanto ki sir 10 se 15 minute ka time chahiye hoga daily basis pe wo aap bas dijiye ki wo aapka mil jaye.
Customer: 10 se 15 minute kaun sa time laga hai isme kitne paise laga hai time isme starting me kitne paise time laga hai isme 10 se 15 minute.
Executive: Sir wo to aap apne according dekhenge na aap morning me check kijiyega kyuki night me bahut sari by leads allocate hoti hai bahut sari post hoti hai by lead aapke portal pe aur night me koi call nahi kar paya hota hai.
Customer: Hum to dekh rahe hai ki hamare ko dekhne se koi lead hi nahi aati jo meri category hai.
Executive: To sir wahi cheez to mai bol rahi hu aapke according nahi aati hai lekin jab hum hum dekhte hai hum aapko group me bhejte hai to hamare according by lead aayi rehti hai sir aur wahi cheez hum aapko yaha bhi bol rahe hai even sudhanshu ne aapko wahi cheez guide ki hai ki aapko wo by lead bhej raha hai aap consume karke dekho aap feedback deke dekho waha pe.
Customer: Wo lead hamare kaam ka nahi hai jo lead usme bheja hai kaam ki nahi hai aapke.
Executive: Hamare category hai hi nahi.
Customer: Aap reply karo na aap waha pe reply.
Executive: Meri category to lock karte hai lock me kuch aata hi nahi hai.
Customer: Aapki baat sahi hai mai aapko ye bol rahi hu ki waha pe aap reply de dijiye na hum bhi to isi cheez ke liye karwa rahe hai aap waha pe reply dijiye by lead ke niche ki ye aapke kaam ki nahi hai aur ye aapke kaam ki hai tabhi to wo banda bhi improve kar payega na aapka by lead ki sir ko aisi nahi aisi by lead chahiye to mai aisa hi share karu.
Customer: Aap ek baar coordinate kijiye unke sath agar aap nahi kar pa rahe hai to aap apne employee ko boliye mai unka number ek baar de deti hu sudhanshu ko wo ab aap unse coordinate karenge karke theek hai aur ye feedback sir employee ke liye hota hai ki employee jisse aapka discussion hua hai uske sath to koi issue nahi hai na.
Executive: Aap ek baar coordinate kijiye unke sath agar aap nahi kar pa rahe hai to aap apne employee ko boliye mai unka number ek baar de deti hu sudhanshu ko wo ab aap unse coordinate karenge karke theek hai aur ye feedback sir employee ke liye hota hai ki employee jisse aapka discussion hua hai uske sath to koi issue nahi hai na.
Customer: Kiske sath.
Executive: Mai keh rahi hu jo bhi aapko feedback jata hai wo aapke employee ke liye jata hai jisse bhi aapka discussion hua hai jab sudhanshu ke sath aapka discussion hua tha to not not satisfied waha pe aapne mark kar diya tha right to waha pe fir system ko ye lagta hai ki ha employee ne koi mis commitment ya fir kuch mis behave to nahi kiya jiski wajah se aapne not satisfied de diya hai to wo to mujhe nahi lagta hai sir ki sudhanshu aapko aisa kuch kiya hoga right kyuki wo already bahut sahi banda hai sir wo kafi acha kaam karta hai aap agar uske sath kaam karenge definitely wo aapko kafi response provide karayega services.
Customer: Wo sabse kaam karega beta.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: Hum unke sath koi kaam karenge.
Executive: Aap ek kaam kijiye aap to coordinate nahi kar payenge na madam ka number de deti hu mai unko mere pass hai wo unke sath coordinate karke services pe kaam karwa lenge theek hai aur ha aur abhi mai yaha se close kar rahi hu ye ki aapko koi dikkat nahi hai account manager ke through theek hai fir aapke pass ek aayega mail aur aapke pass notification aayega satisfied not satisfied ke liye to waha pe bas aap positive feedback de dijiyega theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Mai coordinate karati hu 3 baje tak coordinate karati hu mai aapke employee se inka theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aap ek baar unse discuss kar lijiye cheeze picture lijiyega unko thodi cheeze samjhaiyega sir apne side se theek hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm ha ji okay.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is upset with IndiaMART services.

- No leads generated as per subscription.

- Feels investment is a waste.

- Expresses frustration with coordination efforts.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the need for coordination.

- Executive offered to coordinate with employee.

- Executive assured coordination by 3 PM.

- Executive explained feedback process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will coordinate with customer's employee.

- Customer to provide feedback after coordination.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, coordination, feedback, employee
